verses.verse: אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יָשִֽׁיר־ <WH7891> Then sang מֹשֶׁה֩ <WH4872> Moses וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׁירָ֤ה <WH7892> this song הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and spake לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אָשִׁ֤ירָה <WH7891> I will sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָאֹ֣ה <WH1342> for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <WH1342> gloriously ס֥וּס <WH5483> the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> and his rider רָמָ֥ה <WH7411> hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> into the sea

עָזִּ֤י <WH5797> [is] my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <WH2176> and song יָ֔הּ <WH3050> The LORD וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> has become לִ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <WH3444> and he is become my salvation זֶ֤ה <WH2088> he אֵלִי֙ <WH410> [is] my God וְאַנְוֵ֔הוּ <WH5115> and I will prepare him an habitation אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אָבִ֖י <WH1> my father's וַאֲרֹמְמֶֽנְהוּ׃ <WH7311> and I will exalt
יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [is] a man מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of war יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

מַרְכְּבֹ֥ת <WH4818> chariots פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְחֵיל֖וֹ <WH2426> army יָרָ֣ה <WH3384> hath he cast בַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> into the sea וּמִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> his chosen שָֽׁלִשָׁ֖יו <WH7991> captains טֻבְּע֥וּ <WH2883> also are drowned בְיַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> in the Red
תְּהֹמֹ֖ת <WH8415> The depths יְכַסְיֻ֑מוּ <WH3680> have covered יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> them they sank בִמְצוֹלֹ֖ת <WH4688> into the bottom כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> as אָֽבֶן׃ <WH68> a stone

יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> Thy right hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD נֶאְדָּרִ֖י <WH142> is become glorious בַּכֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> in power יְמִֽינְךָ֥ <WH3225> thy right hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD תִּרְעַ֥ץ <WH7492> hath dashed in pieces אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> the enemy

וּבְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> And in the greatness גְּאוֹנְךָ֖ <WH1347> of thine excellency תַּהֲרֹ֣ס <WH2040> thou hast overthrown קָמֶ֑יךָ <WH6965> them that rose up against תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> thee thou sentest forth חֲרֹ֣נְךָ֔ <WH2740> thy wrath יֹאכְלֵ֖מוֹ <WH398> [which] consumed כַּקַּֽשׁ׃ <WH7179> them as stubble

וּבְר֤וּחַ <WH7307> And with the blast אַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH639> of thy nostrils נֶ֣עֶרְמוּ <WH6192> were gathered together מַ֔יִם <WH4325> the waters נִצְּב֥וּ <WH5324> stood upright כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like נֵ֖ד <WH5067> as an heap נֹזְלִ֑ים <WH5140> the floods קָֽפְא֥וּ <WH7087> were congealed תְהֹמֹ֖ת <WH8415> [and] the depths בְּלֶב־ <WH3820> in the heart יָֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

אָמַ֥ר <WH559> said אוֹיֵ֛ב <WH341> The enemy אֶרְדֹּ֥ף <WH7291> I will pursue אַשִּׂ֖יג <WH5381> I will overtake אֲחַלֵּ֣ק <WH2505> I will divide שָׁלָ֑ל <WH7998> the spoil תִּמְלָאֵ֣מוֹ <WH4390> shall be satisfied נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> my lust אָרִ֣יק <WH7324> upon them I will draw חַרְבִּ֔י <WH2719> my sword תּוֹרִישֵׁ֖מוֹ <WH3423> shall destroy יָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> my hand

נָשַׁ֥פְתָּ <WH5398> Thou didst blow בְרוּחֲךָ֖ <WH7307> with thy wind כִּסָּ֣מוֹ <WH3680> covered יָ֑ם <WH3220> the sea צָֽלֲלוּ֙ <WH6749> them they sank כַּֽעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <WH5777> as lead בְּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> waters אַדִּירִֽים׃ <WH117> in the mighty

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who כָמֹ֤כָה <WH3644> is like בָּֽאֵלִם֙ <WH410> the gods יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Who [is] like unto thee O LORD מִ֥י <WH4310> Who כָּמֹ֖כָה <WH3644> is like נֶאְדָּ֣ר <WH142> majestic בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> in holiness נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> fearful תְהִלֹּ֖ת <WH8416> [in] praises עֹ֥שֵׂה <WH6213> doing פֶֽלֶא׃ <WH6382> marvellous thing
נָטִ֙יתָ֙ <WH5186> Thou stretchedst out יְמִ֣ינְךָ֔ <WH3225> thy right hand תִּבְלָעֵ֖מוֹ <WH1104> swallowed אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

נָחִ֥יתָ <WH5148> hast led forth בְחַסְדְּךָ֖ <WH2617> Thou in thy mercy עַם־ <WH5971> the people ז֣וּ <WH2098> [which] גָּאָ֑לְתָּ <WH1350> thou hast redeemed נֵהַ֥לְתָּ <WH5095> thou hast guided בְעָזְּךָ֖ <WH5797> [them] in thy strength אֶל־ <WH413> about נְוֵ֥ה <WH5116> habitation קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> unto thy holy

שָֽׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> shall hear עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> The people יִרְגָּז֑וּן <WH7264> [and] be afraid חִ֣יל <WH2427> sorrow אָחַ֔ז <WH270> shall take hold יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> on the inhabitants פְּלָֽשֶׁת׃ <WH6429> of Palestina

אָ֤ז <WH227> Then נִבְהֲלוּ֙ <WH926> shall be amazed אַלּוּפֵ֣י <WH441> the dukes אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom אֵילֵ֣י <WH352> the mighty men מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab יֹֽאחֲזֵ֖מוֹ <WH270> shall take hold רָ֑עַד <WH7461> trembling נָמֹ֕גוּ <WH4127> shall melt away כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> upon them all the inhabitants כְנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

תִּפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> shall fall עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> and אֵימָ֙תָה֙ <WH367> Fear וָפַ֔חַד <WH6343> and dread בִּגְדֹ֥ל <WH1419> upon them by the greatness זְרוֹעֲךָ֖ <WH2220> of thine arm יִדְּמ֣וּ <WH1826> they shall be [as] still כָּאָ֑בֶן <WH68> as a stone עַד־ <WH5704> Until יַעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> pass over עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> till thy people יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD עַֽד־ <WH5704> Until יַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> pass over עַם־ <WH5971> till the people ז֥וּ <WH2098> [which] קָנִֽיתָ׃ <WH7069> thou hast purchased

תְּבִאֵ֗מוֹ <WH935> Thou shalt bring וְתִטָּעֵ֙מוֹ֙ <WH5193> them in and plant בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> them in the mountain נַחֲלָֽתְךָ֔ <WH5159> of thine inheritance מָכ֧וֹן <WH4349> [in] the place לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֛ <WH3427> for thee to dwell in פָּעַ֖לְתָּ <WH6466> [which] thou hast made יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD מִקְּדָ֕שׁ <WH4720> [in] the Sanctuary אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> O Lord כּוֹנְנ֥וּ <WH3559> have established יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3027> [which] thy hands
יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> shall reign לְעֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בָא֩ <WH935> went in ס֨וּס <WH5483> For the horse פַּרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh בְּרִכְבּ֤וֹ <WH7393> with his chariots וּבְפָרָשָׁיו֙ <WH6571> and with his horsemen בַּיָּ֔ם <WH3220> into the sea וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <WH7725> brought again יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD עֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> upon them but the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> went בַיַּבָּשָׁ֖ה <WH3004> on dry בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> [land] in the midst הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea פ

וַתִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> took מִרְיָ֨ם <WH4813> And Miriam הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <WH5031> the prophetess אֲח֧וֹת <WH269> the sister אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> of Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַתֹּ֖ף <WH8596> a timbrel בְּיָדָ֑הּ <WH3027> in her hand וַתֵּצֶ֤אןָ <WH3318> went out כָֽל־ <WH3605> and all הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> and all the women אַחֲרֶ֔יהָ <WH310> after בְּתֻפִּ֖ים <WH8596> her with timbrels וּבִמְחֹלֹֽת׃ <WH4246> and with dances

וַתַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered לָהֶ֖ם מִרְיָ֑ם <WH4813> And Miriam שִׁ֤ירוּ <WH7891> them Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> ye to the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָאֹ֣ה <WH1342> for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <WH1342> gloriously ס֥וּס <WH5483> the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> and his rider רָמָ֥ה <WH7411> hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> into the sea ס

וַיַּסַּ֨ע <WH5265> brought מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> So Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel מִיַּם־ <WH3220> sea ס֔וּף <WH5488> from the Red וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> and they went out אֶל־ <WH413> into מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> into the wilderness שׁ֑וּר <WH7793> of Shur וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <WH1980> went שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <WH7969> three יָמִ֛ים <WH3117> days בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no מָ֥צְאוּ <WH4672> and found מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> no water

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> And when they came מָרָ֔תָה <WH4785> to Marah וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָֽכְל֗וּ <WH3201> they could לִשְׁתֹּ֥ת <WH8354> not drink מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> of the waters מִמָּרָ֔ה <WH4785> of Marah כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָרִ֖ים <WH4751> for they [were] bitter הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> of it was קָרָֽא־ <WH7121> of it was called שְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> therefore the name מָרָֽה׃ <WH4785> Marah
וַיִּלֹּ֧נוּ <WH3885> murmured הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> And the people עַל־ <WH5921> at מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> against Moses לֵּאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What נִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> What shall we drink

וַיִּצְעַ֣ק <WH6817> And he cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיּוֹרֵ֤הוּ <WH3384> shewed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD עֵ֔ץ <WH6086> him a tree וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֙ <WH7993> [which] when he had cast אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> into the waters וַֽיִּמְתְּק֖וּ <WH4985> were made sweet הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> the waters שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> there he made ל֛וֹ חֹ֥ק <WH2706> for them a statute וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> and an ordinance וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there נִסָּֽהוּ׃ <WH5254> and there he proved

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> And said אִם־ <WH518> If שָׁמ֨וֹעַ <WH8085> If thou wilt diligently תִּשְׁמַ֜ע <WH8085> hearken לְק֣וֹל ׀ <WH6963> to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהַיָּשָׁ֤ר <WH3477> that which is right בְּעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> in his sight תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> and wilt do וְהַֽאֲזַנְתָּ֙ <WH238> and wilt give ear לְמִצְוֹתָ֔יו <WH4687> to his commandments וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֖ <WH8104> and keep כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֻקָּ֑יו <WH2706> all his statutes כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּֽחֲלָ֞ה <WH4245> none of these diseases אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֤מְתִּי <WH7760> I will put בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian לֹא־ <WH3808> not אָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> upon thee which I have brought עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for I [am] the LORD רֹפְאֶֽךָ׃ <WH7495> that healeth ס

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> And they came אֵילִ֔מָה <WH362> to Elim וְשָׁ֗ם <WH8033> where שְׁתֵּ֥ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֛ה <WH6240> ten עֵינֹ֥ת <WH5869> wells מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of water וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> and threescore and ten תְּמָרִ֑ים <WH8558> palm trees וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <WH2583> and they encamped שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> beside הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> there by the waters
